title: FocusBrew | Productivity Workspace
description: All-in-one digital workspace with todo lists, kanban boards, pomodoro timer, notes, ambient sounds, and more to boost your productivity.

hero.description: A free productivity toolkit that combines essential tools to help you stay focused, organized, and efficient throughout your workday.

stats.title: Everything You Need in One Place
stats.subtitle: FocusBrew combines all essential productivity tools into a single, seamless experience - completely free.

todo.title: Todo App
todo.description: Organize your tasks and boost productivity with our intuitive todo list manager.

pomodoro.title: Pomodoro Timer
pomodoro.description: Work in focused intervals with our customizable pomodoro timer to maximize efficiency.

kanban.title: Kanban Board
kanban.description: Visualize your workflow with our drag-and-drop kanban board for better project management.

ambient.title: Ambient Sounds
ambient.description: Enhance your focus with a collection of calming ambient sounds and white noise.

notepad.title: Notepad
notepad.description: Capture your thoughts and ideas quickly with our minimalist notepad feature.

youtube.title: YouTube Player
youtube.description: Watch educational content or listen to focus music without leaving the app.

habits.title: Habit Tracker
habits.description: Build consistent habits with our visual habit tracking system and statistics.

weather.title: Weather Forecast
weather.description: Quickly check the weather forecast to better plan your workday.

currency.title: Currency Exchange Rates
currency.description: Track major currency exchange rates in real time without leaving the app.

preview.title: See FocusBrew in Action
preview.subtitle: Watch how our free productivity toolkit brings together essential tools to help you stay focused and efficient throughout your workday.

contribute.title: Want to contribute?
contribute.description: If you want to help, suggest improvements, or just give us a star, check out our repository on GitHub.

footer.vibe: This project was 100% developed with "vibe coding"
